refnamediv.refpurpose: Sounds like the shaking of a maraca or similar gourd instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Audio output is a tone related to the shaking of a maraca or similar gourd instrument. The method is a physically inspired model developed from &nameperry;, but re-coded for Csound.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares shaker kamp, kfreq, kbeans, kdamp, ktimes [, idecay]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: idecay -- If present indicates for how long at the end of the note the shaker is to be damped. The default value is zero.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: A note is played on a maraca-like instrument, with the arguments as below.
kbeans -- The number of beans in the gourd. A value of 8 seems suitable.
kdamp -- The damping value of the shaker. Values of 0.98 to 1 seems suitable, with 0.99 a reasonable default.

note.title: Note
note.para: The argument knum was redundant, so it was removed in version 3.49.
